dependent_to.description:
Axom provides a robust, flexible software infrastructure for the
development of multi-physics applications and computational tools.
dependent_to.name: axom

dependent_to.description:
CallFlow is an interactive visual analysis tool that provides a high-
level overview of CCTs together with semantic refinement operations to
progressively explore the CCTs.
dependent_to.name: callflow

dependent_to.description: A next-generation resource manager (pre-alpha)
dependent_to.name: flux-core

dependent_to.description: A scheduler for flux-core
dependent_to.name: flux-sched

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
dependent_to.name: geopm-service

dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.
dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools

dependent_to.description: Node Resource Manager
dependent_to.name: nrm

dependent_to.description: Python CLI for Pacifica Core Services
dependent_to.name: pacifica-cli

dependent_to.description: Declarative statistical visualization library for Python
dependent_to.name: py-altair

dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.
dependent_to.name: py-asdf

dependent_to.description: Command-line interface for the Basis Set Exchange Website
dependent_to.name: py-basis-set-exchange

dependent_to.description: The Brain Modeling Toolkit
dependent_to.name: py-bmtk

dependent_to.description:
bravado-core is a Python library that adds client-side and server-side
support for the OpenAPI Specification v2.0.
dependent_to.name: py-bravado-core

dependent_to.description: Command line program to validate and convert CITATION.cff files.
dependent_to.name: py-cffconvert

dependent_to.description:
An analysis tool providing insight into the portability and
maintainability of an application's source code.
dependent_to.name: py-codebasin

dependent_to.description:
A python package for making stacked area plots of contributions over
time.
dependent_to.name: py-contrib

dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.
dependent_to.name: py-datacube

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependent_to.name: py-geopmdpy

dependent_to.description: Parser tools for Mozilla's Glean telemetry.
dependent_to.name: py-glean-parser

dependent_to.description: Validation schema and code for HEPdata submissions.
dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-validator

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Event System library.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-events

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter Telemetry enables Jupyter Applications to record events and
transmit them to destinations as structured data
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-telemetry

dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications
dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server

dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.
dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf

dependent_to.description:
Melissa is a file-avoiding, adaptive, fault-tolerant and elastic
framework, to run large-scale sensitivity analysis or deep-surrogate
training on supercomputers. This package builds the launcher and server
modules.
dependent_to.name: py-melissa-core

dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.
dependent_to.name: py-mikado

dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.
dependent_to.name: py-multiqc

dependent_to.description: The Jupyter Notebook format
dependent_to.name: py-nbformat

dependent_to.description:
Flexible metadata store for MLOps, built for research and production
teams that run a lot of experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-neptune-client

dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry

dependent_to.description:
A source-to-source Fortran compiler designed to programmatically
optimise, parallelise and instrument HPC applications (written in
Fortran) via user- provided transformation scripts. Additionally,
PSyclone supports the development of kernel-based, Fortran-embedded DSLs
and is used in the UK Met Office's next-generation modelling system,
LFRic.
dependent_to.name: py-psyclone

dependent_to.description: Python library for working with Spatiotemporal Asset Catalog (STAC).
dependent_to.name: py-pystac

dependent_to.description:
A workflow-system agnostic testing framework that aims to make
pipeline/workflow testing easy by using YAML files for the test
configuration.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-workflow

dependent_to.description:
Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the
level of extended quantum circuits, operators, and algorithms.
dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-terra

dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-ray

dependent_to.description: A Python object for standardized reference genome assets.
dependent_to.name: py-refgenconf

dependent_to.description: Rucio Client Lite Package
dependent_to.name: py-rucio-clients

dependent_to.description: Sphinx objects.inv Inspection/Manipulation Tool.
dependent_to.name: py-sphobjinv

dependent_to.description:
A Python library that validates Swagger Specs against the Swagger 1.2
or Swagger 2.0 specification.
dependent_to.name: py-swagger-spec-validator

dependent_to.description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes
dependent_to.name: py-trimesh

dependent_to.description: Self-validating Python objects using JSON schema
dependent_to.name: py-warlock

dependent_to.description: A YAML configuration manager.
dependent_to.name: py-yacman

dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.
dependent_to.name: reframe

dependent_to.description: ROCPROFILER library for AMD HSA runtime API extension support
dependent_to.name: rocprofiler-dev

dependent_to.description:
Local filesystem registry for containers (intended for HPC) using Lmod
or Environment Modules. Works for users and admins.
dependent_to.name: singularity-hpc

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

dependent_to.description:
The tskit library provides the underlying functionality used to load,
examine, and manipulate tree sequences
dependent_to.name: tskit
